subject: Hockey, Ice
Stanley Cup
lead_paragraph: The Anaheim Ducks will have to play without Chris Pronger, as the defenseman was suspended for Game 4 of the Stanley Cup finals for his forearm to the head of Senators forward Dean McAmmond.
snippet: The Anaheim Ducks will have to play without Chris Pronger, as the defenseman was suspended for Game 4 of the Stanley Cup finals for his forearm to the head of Senators forward Dean McAmmond.
